pages.text: The Bubble Kush Strain$(br2)Base THC: 20% $(br)Base CBD: 5% $(br)Effect: Strength
Bubble Kush Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
Bubble Kush Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
Bubble Kush Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting Bubble Kush Weed in an Extractor
You can package your bubble kush weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
